Research interests

I'm interested in the cosmic evolution of galaxies. During my PhD, I studied the evolution of galaxy properties such as dust temperature, star formation rate and gas mass over cosmic time.

I mainly worked with data from the Herschel telescope (PACS and SPIRE), the Spire telescope (MIPS) and the ALMA interferometer. I also started working with the JWST (MIRI) at the end of my PhD.
